description:
http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/ServerUpdate.html

Following line needs to be updated: 

"This operation updates the editable attributes of a server: the name of the server, the server metadata, and the IPv4 and IPv6 access address."

Update Server API no longer supports updating the metadata of server. It only allows updating server name, accessIPv4 and accessIPv6.
Metadata update has moved to server_metadata.py.
title: OSAPI Doc for Update Server needs to be updated

comments.content:
http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/ServerUpdate.html

Following line needs to be updated: 

"This operation updates the editable attributes of a server: the name of the server, the server metadata, and the IPv4 and IPv6 access address."

Update Server API no longer supports updating the metadata of server. It only allows updating server name, accessIPv4 and accessIPv6.
Metadata update has moved to server_metadata.py.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rohitk

comments.content: Seeing as this is a bug in the documentation, I moved it to the openstack-manuals project.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
